With the ability to fly, humans could explore and access areas that were previously inaccessible, such as remote mountaintops or dense forests.

Humans could potentially develop new forms of recreation, such as competitive flying sports or aerial tourism.
The world's population could become more dispersed, as people would have the ability to move to any location they desire.
